split:
\begin{split}
  L&=\varrho\left(\frac12\partial_alpha\omega^2+(1-{\sf\,cos\,}\omega)(\partial_alpha k\partial_alpha k)\right)
\\
  &+\kappa\left(\vphantom{\frac12}(1-{\sf\,cos\,}\omega)
  \left[(\partial_alpha k\partial_alpha k)\partial_beta\omega^2
  -(\partial_alpha k\partial_beta k)\partial_alpha\omega\partial_beta\omega\right]\right.
\\
  &\left.\vphantom{\frac12}~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  +(1-{\sf\,cos\,}\omega)^2\left[(\partial_alpha k\partial_alpha k)^2
  -(\partial_alpha k\partial_beta k)^2\right]\right).
\

\begin{split}
  L_\mathrm{F}&=m^2(\partial_alpha n\partial_alpha n)
  +\frac1{e^2}(n^i\varepsilon_{ijk}\partial_alpha n^j\partial_beta n^k)^2,
\\
  &=m^2(\partial_alpha n\partial_alpha n)
  +\frac1{e^2}\left[(\partial_alpha n\partial_alpha n)^2-(\partial_alpha n\partial_beta n)^2\right].
\

\begin{split}
  \langle n_0^in_0^j\rangle&
  =\frac1{4\pi}\int d\Theta d\Phi\,{\sf\,sin\,}\Theta n_0^in_0^j=\frac13delta^{ij},
\\
  \langle n_0^in_0^jn_0^kn_0^l\rangle&
  =\frac1{4\pi}\int d\Theta d\Phi\,{\sf\,sin\,}\Theta n_0^in_0^jn_0^kn_0^l
  =\frac1{15}(delta^{ij}delta^{kl}+delta^{ik}delta^{jl}+delta^{il}delta^{jk}),
\

\begin{split}
  L=A\partial_alpha\omega^2+B(\partial_alpha k\partial_alpha k)
  +C(\partial_alpha k\partial_alpha k)\partial_beta\omega^2
  +D&(\partial_alpha k\partial_beta k)\partial_alpha\omega\partial_beta\omega
\\
  +E(\partial_alpha k\partial_alpha k)^2+F&(\partial_alpha k\partial_beta k)^2+G(\partial_alpha\omega^2)^2+U,
\
